attributes.action: Recognise and Honour the promotion of free ''Education, Education, Education''.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To recognise the importance to the Country of free education and formulate a free University system of further education. A firm stance of free education to the age of 20 to those passing set levels at 16/17. With correct control this will provide the Nation with the historical quality of future generations of Britons. Qualification should be geared to proven British Taxpayers in the form of income tax credits.
